title: Good Customer Service
text: Very good customer service in helping me with returns. Only downside was that i said i couldn't print the label, they said it was ok and to take the downloaded label to the Post Office, but there was no QR code so Post Office couldn't help. Customer Service did then give me an address to send returns to, but i had had a wasted trip by then.

title: Soshi was patient  and polite and…
text: Soshi was patient  and polite and appears to have  resolved my  questions,  except one with regard to the fasteners  on the dresses otherwise I'd have rented her a 5 star..

title: Great service for returns.
text: I received great service when came the time to send back items and receive new items of a different size.  The team was very helpful and I was able to return my items easily and received the replacement garments quickly.

title: At 1st my transaction didn't go thru
text: At 1st my transaction didn't go thru. Tried a 2nd time & wouldn't go thru!!  Had to back out & resubmit again. (3rd try) plus they have my valid account on file. Must have been a glitch! I love past purchases & will continue to purchase in the future.. Thank You

title: Swimming costume
text: Swimming costume.  I bought online, it was delivered fairly quickly, the size was fairly good and really looked good on.  It didn't get 5 stars for small reasons in the quality of the manufacturing, but I'm being picky, I like well made clothes.  But I would buy from them again for sure.  Very good value for money!

title: Upon receiving my items and trying them…
text: Upon receiving my items and trying them on and found they did not fit, I email Rotita about this and asked if I could get a larger size. With no hesitation, they emailed back with the address to return the good and did there best to upgrade my garment. Alice can I say please keep up with the good work that you are doing. It was appreciated from me here in New Zealand.

title: I love the clothes
text: I love the clothes, they are genuinely top notch and look far more expensive th they are. I started off with bathing suits, which are excellent, but now get the dresses and other outfits as they look so classy and fit me well. They have a wide range of styles and sizes. The only problem is the long wait, but the delivery is slow because they are not wasting their money on more expensive and fuel costly transport. So, cheaper and better for the environment if you don't mind the wait. It can be frustrating at times, but so far so good. The people on the chat box seem helpful.

title: This is my first order and I received…
text: This is my first order and I received my 4 swim suits todays they all are very nice, good material. I am very happy with the suits, the only thingG is I ordered 2 anklet brackets that did not come ..I was offered a return or re-ship them straight away no issue what so ever so hopefully I will get my bracelets in the near future

title: I had ordered too many items and my…
text: I had ordered too many items and my experience on correcting my error was very easy.  The representative was very helpful and polite even at 1:00 am eastern standard time.  Thank you

title: Very patience & understanding with a…
text: Very patience & understanding with a return of an item. Ordered online but had difficulty with return instructions.  Customer Service was A1 an d solved the issue quickly.than k you

title: Good value
text: Rotita tops are nice styling and lovely colors. They won't last forever but at this price you can refresh your wardrobe more often!! I did have an issue with a return order but it was resolved in the end and my money was returned

title: Was having difficulty completing a…
text: Was having difficulty completing a return and exchange online. Used the live chat, Swoshi chatted with me and resolved my issue within minutes. Very helpful 😀

title: Excellent products
text: Excellent products! Been ordering swimsuits for years! Probably have 15-20 pieces dresses, swim suits, cover ups.

title: Refund for unsuitable item
text: Unfortunately my bathing costume was not suitable, the colour was not at all like the colour advertised. I returned it and have received a refund. Correspondence was good and I have received my refund.

title: Great online shop
text: My first time using this site. Delivery was very quick. The clothing was great quality. The prices are great. The sizes are mostly true to size. I would recommend this site to anyone.

title: I placed an order on Nov 5 and it…
text: I placed an order on Nov 5 and it arrived on Nov 16. The clothes I bought was nice out of the 4 only 1 did not fit. The sleeves were not proportioned to the rest of the garment. All the other clothes fit and looked beautiful.

title: Lovely dresses
text: I purchase some dresses in the past and all of them was as described.  I really love their clothing but their return policy can be better.

title: Was happy with swim suite and return…
text: Was happy with swim suite and return was only because of size, was a good experience.

title: I ordered quite a few items from them
text: I ordered quite a few items from them. So far their communication has been great.

title: They answered back really fast
text: They answered back really fast. I still need my stuff asap. It should not have to be redone just sent on from NC

title: helpfull chat
text: Item didn't fit but the chat person was excellent

title: So many options and great prices
text: So many options and great prices. Return was easy and efficient !

title: Everything arrived and all material are…
text: Everything arrived and all material are fine.

title: Thank you hopefully it’s right this…
text: Thank you hopefully it’s right this time.

title: My order arrived promptly, but ....
text: My order arrived promptly, but unfortunately I had to return one top as way too small. The swim wear fitted fine. The Live Chats were helpful with explaining the return process. Sad the return postage cost nearly as much as the item. In hindsight I probably should have offered the top to a friend.

title: First Time Customer
text: I ordered a dress for the first time from this company a few weeks ago for a party. I was pleased with the price as well as the dress, had to make a minor adjustment on the strap but other than that the dress was a perfect fit. Shipping was probably about a week. Overall I was satisfied with everything and I will definitely order again.

title: Hi Quintas!
text: Hi Quintas!You've answered all of my email in a good timely manner, & I really appreciate it. But, the fact remains with the 1st order, that I haven't received. I paid in full via debit card 1038. I have recieved the 2nd order & I love it. PLEASE help me in recieving my order. Thank you in advance! Sheila Jarrell 249 Cherry Street box450 Marienville Pa 16239(814)229 7348Have a great day!!

title: My experience on the app has been bad I…
text: My experience on the app has been bad I know apps can have glitches but as long as it’s resolved quickly I’m fine with it!! I have been working on this app for over two hours trying to pay for what I picked out and it took me a long time to pick it out so I want to be able to buy it now!  Now Sowshi has been really nice to chat with and helpful, I really hope to resolve this tomorrow this is what my husband has given me for my Christmas and I’m not even able to do it by Christmas!

title: I have a chat live session with Sophia
text: I have a chat live session with Sophia, She was very nice and understanding. she understood my situation and offer to rush my order  I gave 4 stars because I'm going to wait to see if it's rushed and if it gets to me on time. If I do get it on time, I will definitely update with 5 stars.

title: Vicky was very helpful in getting the…
text: Vicky was very helpful in getting the exchange set up for a swimsuits that was ordered.   I ended up needing a smaller size but they came through.  Even though it takes a bit of time, it happened without fail.   However, I would like to mention the site is a little tough to figure out where to go to so these things but got it figured out eventually.

title: extremely poor clothing  Items are shipped from China and their helpline number is 🥺 seven60284 three one three one !!!!!!!! found the sizing is inconsistent between items and some of the fabrics are
text: extremely poor clothing  Items are shipped from China I found the sizing is inconsistent between items and some of the fabrics are poor I sent them several emails about return, getting no response from them  I went on the internet and I found this help which is  i contacted the customer service for refund and prepaid shipping label to return this clothes back to the company I returned two items and i received my refund

title: The ordering process was easy
text: The ordering process was easy. Rotatable has lovely stuff.  I followed the size chart and ordered large in everything.  Unfortunately one of the bathing suit tops I ordered was too small and one of the tops I ordered was too large.  I don’t know yet what the return experience will be like.  I don’t know if I will have to pay for shipping the stuff back. It took a long time for me to get the stuff that I ordered.

title: Prompt customer service
text: The customer service regarding my recent order with Rotita was excellent. Sumie, the representative was very prompt and responsive in getting back to me regarding the refunds and exchanges I wanted made. Although some tops did not fit me correctly (various products seem to have differently sized), Rotita was prompt in providing refunds. I wish there is an option to request customized measurements in the future.

title: I enjoy shopping on the site
text: I enjoy shopping on the site. It is user friendly and easy to navigate. I just placed my second order and look forward to the new styles. The items received thus far were nice fabric, no need to iron, and felt good on my skin. I live abroad so returning items is expensive and difficult so I use caution when shopping online. Rotita has given me an opportunity to pump up my chic look without breaking the budget.

title: Recent Purchase
text: I purchased 5 items all in the same size - medium.  They arrived as expected and I liked them all.  The problem is that they did not all fit the same. One top is more like a "large" but I have a friend I can give it to.  The others are all wearable albeit some a little bigger than I would like. I like the styles and will probably order from Rotita again.

title: Pleasantly Surprised
text: I was a little skeptical when saw these beautiful dresses and the prices they were listed at but couldn't resist ordering & checking out for myself. I have now ordered 4 dresses and feel like they won't be my last. I like that the material on the ones I bought are easy to iron and felt good on. Beautiful dresses for weddings, galas, church, etc. Can't wait to try on other articles of clothing.

title: I ordered a dress which had to be…
text: I ordered a dress which had to be returned as the sizing was wrong.  Ordered something else which was great.  I found the postage very expensive, nearly 17.00 English money to return the first order.Sara was very helpful and is arranging my refund.

title: I was overall pleased
text: I was very pleased with the shipping (came a week early), the material and stitching is good and the sizing was exact. The only problem is that they forgot to ship the bottoms of one of the bikinis I ordered. The help I got on the 'chat' was very good, so hopefully I get the rest of the bathing suit shipped quickly.

title: Sunflowers for Summer
text: I absolutely love sun flowers so this was the perfect bathing suit for me. I ordered one size up because so often things run small but it was true to size. So I easily contacted rotita and sent it back for the right size. The quality is great, which is always a risk when ordering online but I was quite pleased. And the shipping was right on time

title: I ordered 3 tops and 1 pair of jeans
text: I ordered 3 tops and 1 pair of jeans. The tops were as I expected, regretfully I one the tops was too snug. But I have the okay to return & exchange that item. I was disappointment with the jeans the fabric was very lightweight and the length was so long if I shortened them to the correct length I would lose the shape of the pants. These are being returned and refunded, no problem

title: i've had issues with the zippers on…
text: i've had issues with the zippers on both dresses, on the one the zipper freezes at the collar line but eventually can be worked free however i fear that eventually it will break.............on the other garment the zipper freezes along the waste line...........again with gentle coaxing it will unzip but again i fear eventually it will fail at that point.

title: Losliya Took care of the issues with my…
text: Losliya Took care of the issues with my order, facilitating my logging into my account, refunding an item that was not received and providing a return label for other items.  Communication was not always clear, and sometimes she would say something, then minutes later say the opposite thing without acknowledging the contradiction. It was a little confusing, but she did provide customer service and solutions to my problems.

title: 3rd order still no bad experience
text: This is my 3rd time ordering from this shop and they again did not disappoint me. All items were present and I was pleased everything fit perfectly. even with the size charts saying some things might be a bit tight all items were perfect size. Quality wise it's somewhat depending on the item. Most things are really nice quality.

title: There is only one thing I would love to…Ups and downs...🙂🙃
text: There is only one thing I would love to see is on the swimming suites. I bought me and my granddaughter  both one and either you get the tops right and the bottoms are to big or in her case the bottoms fix right and the top was to small. I wish you could do that differently. But she and I love the other clothing.

title: Red cardigan
text: I bought this beautiful red cardigan as something to wear over Christmas as it's just the right colour. It looks lovely on and fits just right. I ordered a large as I'm between a size 14/16. The only down side is the material is a little thinner than expected and it looks better undone. I'd still recommend it though if you take that into account before buying

title: Good customer service
text: I ordered a Tankini but it was very tight but I got a free return label and got my refund for that and a Dress. I got a bigger size but have to send it back too because it’s still too tight and another Tankini I ordered is nice BUT the Bottoms are too low so I need to look for a new pair of bottoms that are high waisted. Hopefully I can find another bottom? Rotita didn’t give me any problems with returning or getting my Refunds and they provide a Free Return Label which is great!!

title: refund issue
text: I was chatting with an agent about a returned order that has not been refunded since January 2021. I have spoken to 2 other agents in the past couple of months and it still hasn't been taken care of. Sowshi was my agent tonight and she promised I would receive my refund within 7 work days. She was very helpful .

title: Summer dresses
text: I ordered the clothes in December and did not receive til April. Don’t know what the delay was and never were able to get the delivery resolved until I contacted PayPal.  Received merchandise within one week.  Loved every item!

title: Other reviews have put me off.
text: Other reviews have put me off, but my experience has been a good one. The sizing might scare some people but you just have to be honest with yourself. If you think you are an L then select XL. Shipping was incredible, but I wouldn't expect it to be this good during COVID-19.Estimated Receiving Date: Earliest Date:25 Sep,2020Latest Date:01 Oct,2020We got it on the 21st!

title: Lovely suit fab customer service But!!!!
text: Good customer service express delivery, delivered on time. Lovely suit as described HOWEVER dropped a star because the bra cups (mine was underwired) no where near matches what you would expect for larger size swimsuit 18/20.. Cup size more like a 12/14 so I'm having to get mine altered.  the styles on offer are beautiful though but the bust size is making me think about whether to order again...

title: The quality is excellent however the…
text: The quality is excellent however the items I order were to arrive Dec. 18/20 but only arrived yesterday, Jan 11/21. I was planning on wearing these tops over the Christmas season even though we were not getting together with family. So for that reason, I am disappointed. I will order again but will not be expecting  speedy delivery.

title: Not happy with shipping
text: I ordered 2 dresses for my daughters wedding. Two weeks later I was told one dress is out of stock but still shows available on the website, and the other dress still has not shipped. I placed the order more than a month before the wedding giving an extra couple weeks for international shipping. Now I am fearful that the dress will not arrive on time.

title: Plus size ruffle hem floral print T-shirt
text: Shipping was quick, I thought it would take longer. The top is as described in the picture and fits perfectly. The only fault I have with the top is the elastic is too loose around my waistline. I would have preferred the elastic a bit tighter to give me more shape to the body. The top should fit how the model is wearing it around her waist. Maybe it’s my body shape, I don’t know. I’m a bit disappointed otherwise it’s a nice top.Grace

title: On my first order
text: On my first order, I ordered three bathing suits.  Two have arrived.  One had the wrong sized bottoms.  I'm waiting to see if the third comes in correctly before returning the wrong bottoms.  I am not looking forward to going to the post office to mail the wrong item.  I have a compromised immune system.  Having said all that,  I liked the suits so well that I have placed a second order for 5 suits for my daughter!

title: I have ordered 4 times from Rotita.
text: I have ordered 4 times from Rotita. Everything has been lovely. I made a mistake with the size on one and had to return it. Heard nothing so called them and they reimbursed me immediately. A little blip but in general I was pleased with their service and loved the clothes. Not the most fabulous quality but the styles and designs are gorgeous and people ask where I bought them. I will definitely order again.

title: Shopping on your site was pleasant
text: Shopping on your site was pleasant, the only challenge I had was that I did not know how to apply the available coupons.The moment my order was placed, I was pleasantly surprised by the dispatch speed of the items. Got my order after a few days and everything arrived in a good a decent shape.Thank you for a job well done guys.👍

title: I love the Rotita website
text: I love the Rotita website. They have a great selection of products. I have bought several items from them. However, I have found the sizes are not consistant. When I order a size large, the item is eaither too big or too small. Sometimes it fits just right. Rotita has great customer service and I have had no problems with returns.

title: 1 out 2 items I ordered fit well
text: 1 out 2 items I ordered fit well, one is not looking good. I want to return the second but I don't know how to do it....I'm a first time customer, I usually order through amazon because of easy return..second message : Customer service helped, I'm returning 1 item, everything seems fine now, thank you!

title: The top I received was much too small
text: I've only received one of the six tops i ordered but I ordered a size 2XL and it was much too tight fitting.  If the rest fit like this one, I will have to send them all back.  I looked at the Plus sizes when I ordered and I didn't find any of the styles I liked.  I was concerned that the asian sizes usually are smaller and that was the case because I usually wear a 2XL in clothing made in the US.  I liked everything about the top except it didn't fit.

title: Beautiful colors!!
text: First I'd like to say I love the look of the clothing; beautiful colors. Some of the items I ordered were on sale, which made me even more happy.! The shipping time was much shorter than I expected..very happy about that. My one and only complaint is that I did not realize the clearance items are non-returnable; too small..

title: Satisfied New Customer
text: My initial order went well. 2 of the 3 items I ordered were smaller than I expected. All three tops were beautiful!. Processing the return & refund is underway just a couple days after opening my package. Everything so far seems easy & operating well.  Looking forward to interesting new items to enjoy in the future.

title: Intimate Apparel
text: Way more beneficial than all the other waist and stomach girdies I have. This one holds and corrects my posture it's comfortable and I really like the way in which it is made. It is snug, which I like, I am still in the process of losing weight so it may not be snug for long. But it is worth $18.99.

title: Beautifully made products
text: Beautifully made products, arrived promptly, true to size, dresses and swimwear I have purchased are exactly as advertised.My only suggestion is when making these in all sizes instead of AU 10-12, 14-16, 18-20 etc that they made in between sizes such as 12-14, 16-18 etc.

title: Am very happy with my new swim suit
text: Am very happy with the swim suit I purchased from Rotita. Arrived in a timely manner and is very pretty. The top to the suit was a little more see through than I expected, but is pretty and the bra part fits perfectly. I really like the amount of length available on the straps too. The bottoms are not my usual style but fit well. Would like to be able to mix tops and bottoms. Aside from that am very satisfied with my purchase and will buy more items from the company. Think my daughter is going to order a swim suit as well.

title: The first time i contacted the company…
text: The first time i contacted the company my chat tined out because i was waiting for a rep too long, 2nd time i did the chat, i advised that i was missing the bottom portion of the swimsuit i ordered, they are sending the replacement in 2 days. Rep was very helpful

title: Issue was resolved
text: Issue was resolved, I need to wait a few days to see the refund reflected on my credit card.  There was no place to enter my coupon code so I did a live chat to get it resolved.  Sumi was helpful. It would be nice to have responses in correct grammar, capitalize "i" I.

title: Confusing
text: The website is difficult to use, both in ordering and returns.  This has become such a major project.  It's a shame too because the dresses were gorgeous.  They were tight in my arms and shoulders.   I would like to order clothes again,  but this experience has made me wary.

title: Flattering Tops But Slow Deliveries
text: Receiving items from Rotita gets mixed reviews. The website is easy to navigate, but I had to contact them regarding their reward program as I could not find the info readily on the website. Styles are very nice and flattering. The items, however, can take over a month to receive and one of my tops came rolled up in a plastic bag and very creased which was not very appetizing.Rotita was great at showing good faith. They replied to my complaint and immediately refunded me for this top. I changed their rating frim 3 to 4 stars for this reason. Thanks, Rotita!

title: Easy to Order, some sizing problems
text: It was easy to find the swimsuit I had seen in an ad on Rotita's website. The order took 8 days to arrive which seems a little long but is acceptable. The order was accurate in that the swimsuit was labeled 1X as I had ordered. However, the fit was peculiar, with the bra band being the same length as the bust measurement. Standard sizing would have the band 4-6 inches smaller than the bust measurement.  I appreciate that Rotita carries Plus sizes. Rotita has the most creative, innovative and colorful designs I've ever seen. I love them.

title: It took a little over a month to get my…
text: It took a little over a month to get my parcel, but it was well worth the wait.  I was so happy.  My garment is beautiful, well made and made out of nice material. I will be ordering from them again. Thanks to the customer service representative Sherry.

title: I ordered three bathing suits
text: I ordered three bathing suits. They arrived fairly quickly. The only complaint is I had read reviews before ordering suggesting to order a size up, so I did. They are still small... If I order from here again I will order two sizes up next time. Otherwise, they are really nice!

title: Customer service
text: Struggled with not giving the 5th Star, but website can use some TLC.. so many pop ups for savings if I clicked on texting advertisements and that I did! Bcz who doesn’t love to save, was sent the coupon code with a link to continue my shopping, as I did!! And when I was done I was ver cautious to not over scroll past this part ( bcz a lot of sights will disguise that part) it pretty much to me straight to check out ! In the end I was grateful to notice how to communicate and “Swoshi” was very accommodating w/out hesitations!! Will be waiting for my “REfund” 12 hours 🤞🏼

title: I've shopped at rotita many times
text: I've shopped at rotita many times. I love their clothes! Shipping speed is the only real issue I have had, and really only recently.  Maybe related to covid. Otherwise the clothes are unique, stylish and wonderful. I'm still waiting on orders and dying to try them on.

title: Great quality, Great price!
text: I am very pleased with my first purchase.  Better quality than I expected for the great price.  Only thing I'm not pleased with on a separate order I made is I paid extra for delivery by a certain date.  Now I'm being told it will arrive later than I paid extra for.

title: Attractive Items, Easy Check Out
text: This web site has pretty items. The check out process is easy. The shipping time is long but Covid seems to be slowing everything down. But the communication is effective. The item that I ordered looked different than I pictured online but it is nice.

title: Pleased with shipping
text: Pleased with shipping,  but missing shorts to the flower print swimdress onOrder W2008060014586319. I tried chat but I don't think my message was clear that I only received the swimdress. Would appreciate if XL shorts could be shipped to go with the swimdress.

title: Pleasantly surprised
text: Pleasantly surprised.  It arrived fairly speedily...ordered on 4 March, arrived today 15 March...it fitted and also seems of pretty good quality.  Admittedly the material is not my favourite but hard to tell from a photo.Will definitely use again.

title: Great bathing suit, setting up for a wonderful summer.
text: I ordered a bathing suit and a wrap. And I received it today and was super happy with how it turned out. The bathing suit is really cute, I'm so looking forward to going to the lake in it where I can relax and have fun. And look fabulous.

title: I was asked by her to rate her 5 stars
text: I was asked by her to rate her 5 stars.  I would if not for that poor customer service move.  Perhaps better to say for future customers, ( Would you please rate my service today  It was a pleasure to serve you and we hope to see you again soon.)    My response:  "I'm happy to rate you at the level I feel appropriate and not be told what that is.Thank u so much for your responsiveness and resolve"  j The resolve was speedy, attention paid to my issue after questions and pictures of my issue were sent.  Thank you very much!  I appreciate it.  jGive yourself 5 stars!  w2009200503376375

title: Bathing suits
text: I ordered 2 bathing suits. They both were lovely. True to size, great design and the material and stitching were good. I returned 1 to exchange for a different one. The only down fall that I see, is the process takes a long time.

title: I placed an order and it was being…
text: I placed an order and it was being shipped to the wrong address. Luckily Sumie was my online rep, who immediately responded when I needed help. He/she changed the address and all is well. I am now awaiting the arrival of my order. Thanks Sumie!

title: I look timeless
text: I love your style of clothing I am 66 and I will be 67 in April on the 14. Your style of clothing makes me feel as though there is no age barrier. Especial sence I done look my age. Alll my friends say Girl you look DivaYes I do!!!!!!

title: pretty simple.
text: pretty simple.. I ordered my swim suite and waited and received it. No real problems. The tracking service is aweful until it hits the USA then it gets better. I did get my order sooner then I expected to get it considering its coming from China

title: Placed my first order
text: Placed my first order. Did not see where you could add a coupon code and so the order went through without it. Contacted support and Suganya helped me through the process to get my discount refunded back to my account. Appreciate her help!

title: NO SHIPPING FEES!
text: The clothes are quality, it just takes soooo long to arrive.  Also, most online companies waive the shipping fee if you spend over $50, which I do every time.  You might want to consider doing this for the amount of money that's being spent.

title: Great bathers
text: Great bathers,  colourful and flattering. Woukd be good if you can make the cups for a bigger bust though. I'm a DD and the cups don't quite fit. It only works because of the material across the front, so you don't notice too much.

title: Pleased customer
text: I am pleased with the swimsuits I purchased. The earrings are okay for the price. Since I like the suits, I also decided to purchase a shirt, and am waiting for it to arrive. As long as you have some patience with shipping, it's worth it.

title: I LOVE Rotita
text: I LOVE Rotita! I'm focusing on bathing suits right now, and surprise, surprise, they are true to size! Normally I have to size up with bathing suits, but can wear my usual size medium.I've ordered other items, and am mostly happy with them, but that happens when you can't try them before you buy. It's mostly that they just don't suit me as far as body type,or don't like the particular material, etc. Shipping is quick, and so far the orders have been correct. I've ordered several times, and will do so again.BTW, just ordered THREE bathing suits and a really cool COVID bandanna yesterday! Yay

title: My rating!
text: I did not give Rosita a five star, only because I did not care for the fabric of the items I ordered, nor did they fit…too large.  Sumi returned my money save shipping and I was leased with her service!Audrey Greenwell

title: My experiences with this company was…
text: My experiences with this company was good especially working with Sumie who helped me through returning a couple of items and an exchange. She made the process easy. The only issue is the length of delivery time.

title: Great dresses ..
text: Great dresses ... wrong Sizing I'm very disappointed and frustrated with CLOTHING I ordered a CLOTHING for an all-white party at the end of January 2021, I paid $14,99 to expedite shipping. My products did come in time, Two were the same shirt just different pictures on the front and they were so far off it was ridiculous. (Ordered more than 3 shirts) The stitching on all the shirts was horrible. i went online and i found this help4zero seven seven6eigtᶠᵒᵘʳ ᶻᵉʳᵒ ᵒⁿᵉ ᵒⁿᵉ the customer service was very nice and polite they help to return this item and my money is deposited into my account Do not order from them and do not trust that they will send you what you order!

title: Fits perfectly.
text: I received my item.  it was just as the picture.  I made sure i took my measurements and look at size.  It fits perfectly.  I don't trust many of these sites.  At least it was a satisfying transaction this time.

title: Very helpful service.
text: My queiry was answered and dealt with in minutes. Thank you for your time.

title: I received my order quickly..everything…
text: I received my order quickly..everything was as promised..nice material on the bathing suits.I had to do a return as I ordered wrong sizes but it was very easy and convenient.I would order from here again.

title: Quick response: Suganya was very helpful and Fast too😊…
text: Suganya was very helpful and Fast too😊 I appreciated that, but I sure wish all the material was not polyester: it is very hot where I live, so I would like to see their clothing designs in Cotton.

title: Rotita's customer service respond time…
text: Rotita's customer service respond time is very satisfactory.  They do seem to go above and beyond to fix anything you are unhappy with which most on line companies do not do, especially those not in the USA.

title: Very surprised after bad reviews
text: I looked at the reviews after I completed my order on 11/30/2020. I must admit after reading nothing  but bad reviews I wanted to retract my order and I even tried. I am happy to say I was very happy with my order. I received my order 7 to 9 days later. On the 7th day I missed the delivery, they made sure to deliver the package again on the next day and they also gave it to my neighbor as I requested on my front door with a note. I was given a Rotita bag for shopping with them for free. Although 2 dresses were really big. My daughter liked it so much she will have it taken in. Thank you Rotita for improving the quality of those clothes and working on getting the merchandise to customers in a timely  manor

title: Prosit!
text: I have only recently started shopping at you. What attracted me most was the scale of sizes you offered, mine generally being 2X in UK measurements. Delivery times proved relatively short; material quality good, especially the blouses; sewing generally neat. So, thank you for this positive experience. What I still haven't got to terms with, after several orders, is the differing sizing! 2X from one outlet suits me fine, but 2X from another is either huge or too tight! I know measurements are provided before the customer makes her choice, but still, sizing hasn't been accurate, in my case. Same with shoe size. Besides, your clothes are mainly honest and chic; they pride you, the firm, and dignify the ladies who wear them! Having said that, my final note is a positive one: Carry on like this and we shall deal business for years to come!

title: Nice Clothing, But A Very Long Wait and Not All Are True To Size
text: I placed an order for 5 blouses/tee shirts from Rotita on January 11th. One blouse arrived a week ago and the final four arrived yesterday (Feb. 1st). I felt that this was a very long time to wait, however I realized by the postal return address that the items were shipped from China. I was not aware of this going into the order. I was able to "track my order," but it was not very helpful.Four of the five blouses fit well and look pretty good (one is very long . . . more like a mini-dress), but one of the blouses is unusually large for a Medium. The sleeves are very long, reaching down to my fingertips, and the shoulder seams are off my shoulders. I will need to send this item back . . . I probably will not replace it. I am a petite sized woman (5' tall), and Rotita offers no availability for petite sizes. I realize that when I mail order clothing with no option for petite I am taking a chance. Suggestion: offer your clothing for Petite Ladies!All of this being said, the clothing is beautiful, most of the colors true to the colors in the pictures, and appear to be well-made. I will be wearing one today to church.

title: I discovered Rotita during lockdown as…
text: I discovered Rotita during lockdown as was for some reason bombarded with ads of their clothes...I finally caved in and spent way more than I shouldve. But despite this being shipped from Hong Kong it arrived less than a week later  when flights were already dropping off round the world. They have some stunning and very unusual tops..I got 5...have had positive comments about every single one of them. To be on safe side order a size bigger than u would normally as clearly made for an Asian Market I think. Was very happy with 4 of the 5 tops but I did order a med by mistake in one of them. Main drawback is the fabric..shirts that look like white cotton and lace are actually synthetic..however still look good..I ordered for summer and for the most part they fit that description tho being nylon in most of them makes them quite hot to wear on a hot day.  But overall v pleasantly surprised  and shipping was incredibly fast considering the global pandemic.  Would order again but check more closely the material used b4hand. Stunning from a distance tho and the quality of the construction pretty good. Also got some great tights  and a free necklace and pair of earrings were thrown in due to the amount I had spent. Shipping was free if I recall correctly. Genuine site in my view.

text: Everything was great.  I am just not used to someone typing so informally.  "u" instead of "you".  No capital letters when appropriate, and incorrect punctuation.  Not a huge deal, but makes it more professional.

title: Love the clothes and they fit well
text: Love the clothes and the fit well

title: After reading the reviews I was…
text: After reading the reviews I was concerned.  I purchased two dresses and one swim suit 24 hours ago.   I have had good communication and confirmation the order has now been despatched within one working day. I have not received the garments yet but am very satisfied with the timely feedback and the livechat option.My clothes arrived during the time frame advised at time of ordering.  The quality of the dresses and swim suit was excellent.   The swimwear and one dress fits lovely.  Other one I am returning for refund which is a straight forward process.I have today ordered another 7 pieces and got 30% off.  I am a very happy customer.I cant believe at this stage the negative experiences some people have had then 5 star experiences.  It is like there is another Rotita that provides cheap nasty clothes.  This is a geniune review and I am wearing one of the dresses at work today and alot of compliments.Before you place an order for an garment there is a chance to read reviews of others that has purchased it.  Gives you an idea of the quality before you confirm the order.

title: nice and amazing dress

title: I bought several items from this…
text: I bought several items from this company. I bought a pair of Jean's that were so cute and they fit perfect. Their shirts on the other hand are not comfy at all and I think it's the material they use to make them. I've had to send everything back except the Jean's and one shirt that was made out of a softer material. They were very quick to refund my money too.

title: SELECTION and FIT
text: Great selection and if you factor in that in most cases you will likely want a larger size than you would normally order in Canada, you will enjoy the fit.

title: customer service is not bad at all
text: I purchased 4 items from them, the sizes were not quite right. Some of them larger than they described, some of them are smaller than the description. To save trouble since the prices were low, I returned those I absolutely cannot wear and kept the rest. They did refund me immediately. Compared to "Just Fashion Now" and some others, their size and materials are better and at least closer to the description. I hope that give them time, they will finally get the concept of following the words in their description if they want to be successful in selling in America. Despite what I said before, I have decided not to order anything from foreign vender (meaning my orders are shipped from a foreighn contry) save save myself time and energy.

title: Ordered blouse to test company products....
text: Ordered blouse to test company products. I was very happy with quality of material (nice weight, not flimsy) and very happy with quality of lace on bottom (tough, heavy duty). I am a plus size and found size matches 'Penningtons' sizes. My only disappointment is that all sleeves are 1/2 length, which is not flattering if you are top heavy. I will keep checking site to see if they start selling long sleeves and Vnecks styles.

title: Navy Blue Lace Juumpsuit
text: Recently purchased a navy lace jumpsuit which arrived in approx 12 days but it was way too big. Used the ticketing system and requested exchange for a smaller size. Address provided by Rotita and I posted jumpsuit back. After posting I realized I put wrong st no so assumed It would be lost. Because i really wanted to get this jumpsuit I went online and purchased another in correct size. I contacted through the ticketing sytem and explained - several days later was advised that they received item I thought was lost due to my mistake, I asked for a refund instead of exchahge as originally requested. I received advise that they would  process refund. True to their word I received refund into my bank within 3 days.  Throughout the whole process i found communication excellent and their ticketing system effective. Today I received correct size garment in only 12 days. Quality is excellent and I am very happy with the communication, quality of item and the excellent customer service. Reviews have lots of negative but need to give credit where credit  is due. I am certainly confident to shop with Rotita again.

title: Rotita review - good experience
text: I was quite nervous about receiving my 2 dresses. I ordered them due to the bargain price and look of them but after reading some reviews feared the quality and fit would be poor. However I received them today (quick delivery) and they are actually lovely and fit perfectly. I wouldn't hesitate to buy from Rotita again.

title: The swimsuits are true to size
text: The swimsuits are true to size,  I ordered up thinking they would be small,  and they were way too big.  The bright colored ones,  that's a different story,  the colors are nothing at all like the pictures!! They really enhanced them.  But I returned all, I dealt with SURI, on chat, and she was amazing,  and refunded me within the hour!!

title: I'd give you a 5 but

title: It took a few sizing mishaps
text: It took a few sizing mishaps, but I learned their sizing and return system and  have had no problems on returns using online chat. It is awkward and clumsy but I do like the many purchases I have made. Requires patience and good manners.

title: Pleased
text: I waited a month to get my order. I returned a shirt for a larger size and it has been nearly a month with no credit refund or new size.My concern was addressed immediately after my review.

title: Bought an awesome bathing suit and it…
text: Bought an awesome bathing suit and it arrived within the delivery time and was true to size in the plus sizes. Lots of compliments. Taking a chance on a 2 piece dress and shirt today. Looking forward to receiving them

title: I'd buy from them again if I can't find locally
text: I want to shop local, but couldn't find very stylish swimsuits so I ended up with Rotita.  I was nervous about the shipping and sizing.  My items actually arrived quite early and look great.  I wouldn't suggest ordering if you need them by a quick date because it does take a while, but I had no timeline.  The size seemed to run a little small for how they told me to measure, but I was in between so I ordered the larger size and it fits just about right, a little snug.  The reason I didn't go 5 stars is because there are some weird hooks on 2 of the suits I ordered (the bikini hook is normal).  One of them I can reach and isn't bad to hook, but the other I've had someone else hook for me--that isn't very convenient.  I'd rather not order from them again just because I want to support my neighbors, but I will if they are the only place to get what I want.  For the price and color they are great.  For the material and hooks, they are so so.

title: Good experience!
text: I was a little apprehensive about my order of one top after I started reading reviews of this company. They gave me a long range date of delivery, but it came in much quicker. The quality was as good as many pieces of clothing I have purchased locally. There was one tiny spot on the front hem that looked over-sewn by the machine, but it isn’t noticeable. I wore the top to church today and got so many compliments. Even my husband told me it looked really nice. So maybe I got lucky, but it was definitely worth the price ( which wasn’t bad at all).

title: Great prices
text: Great prices.  I received the first partial shipment about 10 days after I ordered.  About a week later I checked on the remaining items and received an email the next day saying it's on its way.

title: Minus the time for delivery the price…
text: Minus the time for delivery the price and quality is great!

title: This is the first time I have ordered…
text: This is the first time I have ordered something from this site. The bathing suits were very appealing however I had difficulty in receiving my order. I kept updating the customer service department by mean of tickets and they were always very prompt to respond.I must commend DEMI who issued a full refund to me for all the inconvenience and disappointment caused.I will definitely recommend them for her professionalism and efficiency in resolving the issue.

title: I ordered 8 items
text: I ordered 8 items. The price is great, but it has been 3 weeks and I have only received 3 of the items ordered. They are nice and fit well, but where is the rest of my order? Also each item has shipped individually. FINALLY! All the items arrived 30 days after the order was placed. The final shipment from China took 2 weeks to arrive. Love the clothes! Hate the shipping. I'm rating 4 stars because of the shipping delays.

title: Their great! super 😸

title: I have tried before to get someone to…
text: I have tried before to get someone to respond and today I tried again and Demi responded immediately. I got the address to return my order and get a different size. Also, this is an inconvenience to return this merchandise for a different size since your company does not know American sizing.  You should have a size chart that is comparable to U.S. sizes.  I love the 2 blouses I am returning for the next size larger but I don't even know what to size I should order! I hope someone will actually read this!!  Thank you

title: Good Company
text: Second Post...My first post was not a good one because they had not sent my refund and it had been since February, 4 months.  But once they saw the review, whoever is in charge, did right and refunded my return. The merchandise was good, it just did not work for me, hence the return. So I can no longer justify giving a low rating.  Glad someone is watching and reading and paying attention to the company.  So whoever that is, Thank you!

title: Skeptical at first, delighted with the outcome!
text: I was skeptical to purchase clothing online, something I've never done before. However, I needed some new clothes for my first ever cruise & some of their items looked really darling. I ordered 5 items; a bathing suit which was really inexpensive and 3 tops to go with my blue capris and one long-sleeve sweater top.  It did take awhile for my order to arrive; didn't realize this was a Chinese company. I was certainly pleased when they all arrived - the bathing suit was perfect. I had tried styles & sizes on a store, had a good idea of what I wanted and it's fantastic!  The 3 tops looked fabulous on my cruise and wash great! I did send the sweater top back; it didn't look like the website & was too large. Returning was painful; have to get a reference number & include it on the pkg when you return it. I paid my own postage to send it; felt it was still worth getting my money back. Finally after the return process went through all its many phrases my money was refunded; took about a month. In their defense, Rotita kept you informed with emails of your progress ordering, shipping, delivery & returning. I would do business with this company again as I am very happy with the look & quality of my 4 purchases!

title: I've had very good luck with items I've…
text: I've had very good luck with items I've ordered from Rotita.  On a couple occasions I returned something and received a prompt exchange or refund.  After a very bad experience and reading reviews on another online clothing company, I decided to look up reviews on Rotita and write my own review.  They have very cute dresses, jumpsuits and swimsuits.  Again, I've personally had good luck and have received very cute items.

title: Clothes are good value and well made…
text: Clothes are good value and well made but not always the nicest material. Be realistic though...at about £25 on average for a dress you get what you pay for.The returns process can be a right faff too, but in fairness they really helped to sort the problem out and my refund was processed quickly.

title: Rotita is not the nightmare some people describe
text: I have ordered about 4x from Rotita over the last year or so. I was very wary because of reviews I've read about similar sites that ship from China. Overall, I have been very happy with my orders. Some of the clothes do seem cheap, but that's to be expected for the low prices.I've ordered multiple dresses and swimsuits. I love the swimsuits and I've never found such unique styles anywhere else. I also love the huge selection of dresses. These probably aren't dresses that are going to last for years and years, but a lot of that depends on how you care for them. I wash mine in the machine on a gentle cycle, but I do not hand wash. Most of them have held up well.  The sizing can be hard to figure out but overall is pretty accurate. If you have a large chest, I would definitely suggest ordering up a size. I haven't returned anything yet, so I don't know how that process works.The shipping is much quicker than it was last year. I placed an order on 5/14 with free shipping and paid the $5.99 for the upgrade on processing/shipping time. I received my order on 5/20.

title: I didn't read any reviews before…
text: I didn't read any reviews before ordering, but it's probably a good thing.  Based on the one star assessments, I figured if I did get the clothes they would be cheaply tailored and arrive next year.  However, within the promised month I'd received my blouses and the fit was not too bad as far as the sizing chart guide had indicated for me to order.  The quality of the clothing, while not bespoke (lol), was good and the materiels used were also of a good quality.  When the blouses arrived there was a fairly strong chemical smell which a bit of handwashing took care of.  Since I bought lacy blouses there is no way I'm washing them even on a gentle cycle.  All in all, shopping rotita was not the horrible experience for me it was for others.

title: Before I read all the negative reviews
text: Before I read all the negative reviews, I ordered four swim suits - three have arrived and I am very happy with the quality of fabric and the fit.  I did order a size larger and that proved to work out well for me.  Since the prices were so good, I went a little crazy ordering so many swim suits.  The colors are just as displayed on the website.  Additionally when I had a question the company emailed me right back within 24 hours with my answer.  I'm extra cautious now having read so many terrible issues and very hesitant to order anything else .... will see if I get my fourth suit!  The only reason I didn't give this company a five star rating is because it's been about 10 day's wait for the last suit and the others arrived within a few days!

title: Better Than I Imagined
text: Bought 3 bathing suits that arrived about 2 weeks after ordering. Way sooner than expected. All 3 fit as described, with only 3 minor defects in symmetry and stitching that are not noticeable to others, but make the fit slightly off. The material is decent for the price of the bathing suits. I had no issues with any part of my experience and will probably buy again, with the understanding these are not meant to be very high quality garments, but definitely wearable and fit fine for the price you're paying.

title: Well I haven't had any problems with…
text: Well I haven't had any problems with them. I ordered a swim dress which took a week to arrive. I was so impressed with it that I ordered a different one which again only took a week to arrive. Sadly this was didn't fit as well and the material wasn't as good so I returned it, it cost me £8!! But I found the return policy absolutely fine and I've just received notification from PayPal that they have refunded my money. No complaints from me other than the cost of return.

title: I found Rotita clothing good sizing,and…
text: I found Rotita clothing good sizing,and ok for the money,only down side was delivery, 4 weeks.I have repeatedly washed items I bought March last year.😀

title: I have ordered two tops from Rotita and…
text: I have ordered two tops from Rotita and both are very good quality, fit as expected, arrived on time, and look exactly like the pictures.  I am about to order a dress from them for a wedding.  The only complaint I have is that neither garment came with any labels AT ALL so I don't know how to wash them.  Therefore, I am washing one on a gentle cycle, as it appears to be polyester, and the other I am handwashing as it has a lot of lace on it.  Both have held up fine through several washings.  (I got no response when I emailed Rotita about this problem.)

title: I am happy with the purchases
text: I was hesitating after reading some of the reviews. But I bought 3 items (a Christmas sweater, a black top and a dress) in the past two months, Dec and Jan, the materials are comfortable, and the qualities  are decent and very good for all 3 items. They do look like the pictures shown on the website. I consider myself very picky so I am pleasantly surprised. I will buy more now since I have more confidence from my own experiences...

title: Happy with service and quality.
text: Not sure about all the negative reviews. I took a chance in early December and ordered 1 top. I received it in about 2 weeks and it fits just fine. So about 2 weeks ago I ordered 7 more. They came today. Only 1 is a little tight. The fabric is good, not thin. I ordered 1size up and that was perfect for all the rest. I will order from them again.

title: I ordered three blouses and then…
text: I ordered three blouses and then changed my mind, since the tops would not be in time to wear over the holidays. Rotita refunded my money in 24 hours without an issue.Good service.

title: I ordered a raincoat from them off of…
text: I ordered a raincoat from them off of Facebook. It took a while to get to me in Madison WI. But when it came it was what I thought it would be. A basic light weight raincoat. I got a small because that is what I normally wear and it fit fine. It was really a cheap price and it isn't an expensive looking raincoat, but I wore it in the rain and it worked. I like it because it was cheap and it fits. No idea on returning things but you get what you pay for.

title: I'd recommend
text: I saw these cute clothes pop up almost every time I was on line.  I was skeptical about trying them due to all the bad reviews.  I was in desperate need of white dresses so I decided to get a prepaid card and give them a try.  Surprisingly, my experience was great.  I received shipping confirmation and a tracking number within 3 days.  The dresses came in 2 1/2 weeks.  They were just as pictured, gorgeous.  The only two things I'd share....order a size up and if you're curvy, 2 sizes up.  Also, the quality is not bad but you will need a slip underneath as they are very thin.  I've since placed another order and received shipping confirmation within 3 days.  I haven't received the dresses yet but tracking has them in NY.  I'd recommend but lower your expectations!  Remember, you get what you're willing to pay for....and the price reflects that.

title: I love Rotita Clothing
text: Date of experience: September 07, 2018

title: Good experience with Rotita
text: I ordered twice with them. No problem at all. First time I had to return 4 dresses because the sizzing is different Wear medium normally but had to reorder large. Quality is ok for the price. No problem to get full refund. Just have to follow the instructions they give on the website, better to use ticket system than any other communication method.As the site clearly says the return fees must be assumed by the customer. For the second order, no problem.... one product sent back for full refund and 3 others for replacement. Quick and efficient. Both orders got reimbursed by PayPal the next day and items resent by rotita the following day. They always answer the ticket within 24 hours. Their time zone is different. Overall experience very satisfactory

title: No issues with purchase
text: No issues with purchase. Happy with my dress. The material was not as expected but dress is flattering on nevertheless. I received complements wherever I went.

title: Would order again
text: Placed my order July 24th and received my order August 13th.  Recieved all of my items in good condition and as described on website. Sizes were accurate. Despite all of the negative reviews, I didn't have any issues.

title: Love the clothes and customer service!
text: Love the clothes. Quality is pretty good. Customer service is prompt and courteous. Bonus for me was that they took the extra step to confirm my order was not fraudulent and my credit card was not being used illegally. My shipment shipped pretty quickly and it was easy to track. Stylish clothes. Will definitely keep using Rotita for shopping online.

title: I know a lot of people have had a bad…
text: I know a lot of people have had a bad experience with this company, and I'm sure it is all valid, however my recent shopping experience with them was pretty good. I ordered a bathing suit and romper, both were delivered BEFORE the estimated date; the items fit perfect; and Rotita communicated with me in a timely and professional manner. The quality of the material was not ideal, and I do wonder what the poor souls that made these clothes had to endure for it, but I did feel compelled to give them a good review because they did right by me. Ordering from this company may be hit or miss, but in my case, it was a hit.

title: The swimsuit I ordered was awesome
text: The swimsuit I ordered was awesome, perfect fit too. I expected delivery to take much longer but it was quite fast. Thx Rotita, I will order more!CS

title: I really enjoy ordering from Rotita
text: I really enjoy ordering from Rotita, the clothes are good quality with affordable prices.  Sometimes the items I order don't fit but they quickly refund the amount to my account.  I will continue to order more.

title: Free shipping
text: Free shipping, good quality, but shipping takes forever.  Not a good site for ADD personalities.

title: Not What You'd Expect
text: I placed an order from this site about 2 weeks ago and just received the items less one top.  In all honesty, I did not expect the quality to be what it is and I ordered two sizes up thinking the items would be small. However, I have been pleasantly surprised and cannot wait to place my next order. Quality was above average and ordering a size up would have been fine. But, everyone is different so pay close attention to their size chart and item dimensions.The only negative, so far, is their lack of communication. They respond rather quickly but only if you initiate contact. My order had already been shipped without my knowledge. They sent tracking info after I asked...within 2 minutes. Lastly, I wish they carried women's dress/office pants.

title: Over all good experience even though 3 dresses did not fit my  arms.
text: Ordered 5 dresses all of them the same size 2 fit me and are absolutely beautiful. the other three One of them the sleeves were not the same length.and the other two are to tight on my arms (I do have big arms so not blaming the company) and I did get half my money back and was able to keep the dresses. My daughter loves them and they fit her.

title: I just received part of my order
text: I just received part of my order. 3 dresses and a shirt. I ordered before reading all of the negative reviews.  I was nervous after that. However,  to my surprise all of the clothes fit well. I wear a 12-14, and ordered a Large. The material is fine. For the low prices, it's definitely worth it. They have really unique styles.  I love their website. Will probably order again if all goes well with the rest of my order.

title: Although clear communication is…
text: Although clear communication is sometimes difficult, customer service is very quick to respond and always attempts to resolve an issue and work with the customer.

title: Like my stuff thus far.
text: Date of experience: May 30, 2018

title: Happy with the process
text: I read the reviews and bought about $200 worth of stuff for myself and my daughter knowing that sizing seemed small so i ordered larger.  Got part of my order within 3 weeks of the order being placed which i was happy with.  I had read that returning is a pain in the *ss so I ordered knowing i didn't plan on returning anything and knowing they make an offer so you don't return.  So there was two out of five items that didn't fit.  I logged in and got a 30% refund in paypal - they do it immediately and I was satisfied.  I think people need to do their homework and use common sense.  The clothing is cheap - that's what you get cheap clothing.  Mine was satisfactory but you can obviously tell its not high end.  And the sizing, there's plenty of warnings about that and it's really a chance you take ordering online.  Overall, the stuff that fit, I'm happy with and i wasn't expecting high end clothing.  The pictures online are deceiving in that they are young, small size models that look good in anything.  So do your homework and manage your expectations.

title: This is my second review
text: This is my second review, I still have the same opinion, clothes are affordable and they look and fit great, besides I do not see anyone with the same design as me around my neighborhood. Just the delivery, takes a while.

title: I have never ordered ladies clothing…
text: I have never ordered ladies clothing off the internet but have had health issues so I don't want to shop. The pictures that kept popping up on FB were cute so I decided to give it a go. Got confirmation that order went through but it took 4 days for tracking information to be on-line. Was dismayed at the delay of electronic information.I am used to very fast delivery on most things and was somewhat disappointed that this took 19 days from start to finish to be delivered. Was pleasantly surprised at the quality of material in the top I chose so overall, if you are not in a hurry for your item, this works!

title: YOU must pay return shipping, even if item is not as described.
text: I haven't ordered yet, but I LOVE the style of their clothes!UPDATE:. I ordered and received black hooded jacket on 5/3/18.  It looked nothing like it did in pic.  Fabric was cheap looking, and even the style didn't look the same.  I had to open a "ticket" because I realized they expected me to pay for the return postage.  (I thought they'd pay it, because they advertise "30-day easy returns.").  Then, they replied to my "ticket" by offering me a 50% refund, and I could keep the item.  I replied "Why would I want to keep an item I don't like and only get half of my money back?".   Then, they offered an 80% refund ($22.60 for an item I paid $28 for), and I accepted.  I figured the return shipping would cost at least $6.  So...the customer service wasn't the worst, but I never like to pay shipping for items that aren't as described.  I don't think I'd order from them again for that reason.  But, in fairness, one crappy item doesn't mean they're all like that, and they could have just insisted I return the item at my cost in order to get a refund.

title: Great customer service

title: Shopping was fun and easy

title: I enjoy shopping on this site and my…

title: I love this site
text: I love this site. I received my merchandise last week and I was very pleased.

title: I love the way Rotita tries to quickly…
text: I love the way Rotita tries to quickly resolve any issue to the customer's satisfaction. It's great customer service!

title: Great experience
text: I bought a couple swimsuits and they arrived exactly when planned. One was too small in the bust, the other too big. I contacted rotita, they resolved the issue with a couple days of emails. I asked for a return, they offered a partial refund $27 back on a $55 order and I keep the items. I didn't want to spend that much on things that didn't fit, so I asked if they could either offer more back or I would ship back. They offered $47 back and I got to keep the items. I gave one to my friend and I kept one that is a little big in the bust, but worth it for the amount! I thought it was professionally handled and the quality was great!
